name: BILLING_IMPORT_INFO
description: This table stores items that contain billing payment details.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BILL_INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the invoice number.

columns.name: BILL_PMT_DPST_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the payment deposit date.

columns.name: BILL_PMT_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the payment amount.

columns.name: BILL_PAGE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the document page number.

columns.name: BILL_PAYER_NM
columns.description: This item stores the payer name in the scanned document.

columns.name: BILL_PAYER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the payer ID in the scanned document. We get the ID of the payer from the payer name in DCS-1716.

columns.name: BILL_ACCT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the guarantor ID.

columns.name: BILL_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the hospital account ID.

columns.name: BILL_REF_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the payment reference number on the scanned document.
